title: Carrot and Potato Puree Recipe for Babies
content:

title: Barley Apple Porridge ( Cereal ) Recipe for Babies
content: Barley makes the best first food for babies. Since it is less allergenic and it is quite filling too. I made an easy porridge using that and added some apples into it to make it a little sweeter. I used the whole barley, so I used a pressure cooker to cook it. I have included a method for cooking

title: Apple, Pear and Cinnamon Puree Recipe for Babies
content:
Apples and Pears make a portion of great baby food. I give apple puree one day, pear puree(recipe soon) the next day. Then I mix them up and feed her. I also add a dash of cinnamon to spice it up. Check out my detail post about spicing baby foods.

title: Steamed Mashed Banana ( Nendrapazham )  Puree Recipe for Babies
content: Bananas are high in potassium. In our place, we get a type of banana called as “matti pazham“. It will small in size and smells so sweet. We mash them up and feed babies. You don't have to steam them. It is really good for babies. But I have heard that you cannot find it in many place

title: Health Powder Mix (Wheat, Moong Dal, and Almond ) Recipe for Babies
content: This makes a great filling and protein-rich food for your babies because it has wheat and moong dal in it. And the addition of almonds makes it super healthy. I used wheat powder in this recipe, my mom buys whole wheat, wash it, dry it in sun and grind it in the mill, I used that homemade powder

title: Potato, Carrot and Beetroot Puree Recipe for Babies
content: I have already share carrots and potato puree in my blog already. For a variation, I added some beetroots in the puree as well. So it is more healthy and nutritious. title: Pomegranate Juice Recipe for Babies
content: Summer is here. It is absolutely crucial to feed as much liquid food to your baby either as water or in the form of juices. title: Pear ( Sauce ) Puree Recipe for Babies
content: Pears make great baby food. I give apple puree one day, pear puree the next day and I mix them and make apple pear puree and feed her. I also add a dash of cinnamon to spice it up.
